mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.userid , A.username , A.userbran , case when PWDCOMPARE(#{strpwd }, A.UserPW) = 1 then 'Y' else 'N' end as pwchk ,STUFF( (SELECT ',' + x.progid FROM user_power x WHERE (x.userid = a.userid and x.progid IN (905,906,908)) FOR XML PATH ('')) ,1,1,'') progid FROM user_master A , user_power B WHERE A.UserId= #{strid} AND A.userid = B.UserId AND A.use_yn = 'Y' AND A.use_yn = 'Y' AND B.progid IN ( '905','906','908')
